mapper.select: SELECT article_id, ctgry_name, article_scope, to_char(article_regdate,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" AM HH"시" mm"분"') "article_regdate", article_payment_type, article_payment_fee, article_title, article_content, article_ctgry_type FROM articles join ctgry_values USING(article_id) join ctgries USING(ctgry_id) join article_ctgries using(article_ctgry_id) WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND To_char(article_regdate, 'YYYY-MM') = #{year}||'-'||#{month} AND article_ctgry_type IN ('income','spend') ORDER BY article_regdate

SELECT article_id, ctgry_name, article_scope, To_char(article_regdate, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" AM HH"시" mm"분"') "article_regdate", article_payment_type, article_payment_fee, article_title, article_content, article_ctgry_type FROM articles join ctgry_values USING(article_id) join ctgries USING(ctgry_id) join article_ctgries USING(article_ctgry_id), (SELECT trim(to_char(psn_month_start,'00')) "pms1" ,trim(to_char(psn_month_start-1,'00')) "pms2" FROM psns WHERE user_id = #{userId}) WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND To_char(article_regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN #{year} ||'-' ||#{month} ||'-' ||"pms1" AND #{year2} ||'-' ||(#{month2}) ||'-' ||"pms2" AND article_ctgry_type IN ( 'income', 'spend' ) ORDER BY article_regdate
SELECT image_path FROM images where article_id = #{article_id}

SELECT article_id, ctgry_name, article_scope, to_char(article_regdate,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" AM HH"시" mm"분"') "article_regdate", article_payment_type, article_payment_fee, article_title, article_content, article_ctgry_type FROM articles join ctgry_values USING(article_id) join ctgries USING(ctgry_id) join article_ctgries using(article_ctgry_id) WHERE article_id = #{articleId} AND user_id = #{userId}
SELECT hashtag_value FROM hashtag_refs join hashtags USING(hashtag_id) WHERE article_id = #{articleId}

SELECT article_id, ctgry_name, article_scope, to_char(article_regdate,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" AM HH"시" mm"분"') "article_regdate", article_payment_type, article_payment_fee, article_title, article_content, article_ctgry_type FROM articles join ctgry_values USING(article_id) join ctgries USING(ctgry_id) join article_ctgries using(article_ctgry_id), (SELECT trim(to_char(psn_month_start,'00')) "pms1" ,trim(to_char(psn_month_start-1,'00')) "pms2" FROM psns WHERE user_id = #{userId}) WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND To_char(article_regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN #{year} ||'-' ||#{month} ||'-' ||"pms1" AND #{year2} ||'-' ||#{month2} ||'-' ||"pms2" AND article_ctgry_type IN ('income','spend') ORDER BY article_regdate
SELECT "year" FROM (SELECT To_char(article_regdate, 'YYYY-MM') "year" FROM articles WHERE user_id = #{userId}) GROUP BY "year" order by "year" desc
SELECT psn_monthly_payment, psn_month_start FROM psns WHERE user_id = #{userId}
